item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign safety Dane CruikshankMar 31, 2022The Bears on Thursday signed unrestricted free agent safety Dane Cruikshank to a one-year contract. Cruikshank arrives in Chicago after spending his first four NFL seasons with the Titans.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign QB Trevor SiemianMar 29, 2022The Bears on Tuesday signed unrestricted free agent quarterback Trevor Siemian to a two-year contract. The Northwestern product has appeared in 33 NFL games with 29 starts over six seasons.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign OL Dakota DozierMar 23, 2022The Bears on Wednesday signed unrestricted free agent guard Dakota Dozier to a one-year contract. Dozier has appeared in 76 games with 27 starts over seven NFL seasons with the Jets (2015-18) and Vikings (2019-21).
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign FB Khari BlasingameMar 22, 2022The Bears on Tuesday bolstered their offense by signing unrestricted free agent fullback Khari Blasingame to a one-year contract. The 25-year-old has appeared in 32 NFL games with 13 starts over three seasons with the Titans.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign DE Al-Quadin MuhammadMar 20, 2022The Bears on Sunday signed unrestricted free agent defensive end Al-Quadin Muhammad to a two-year contract. He spent the last four seasons playing on a Colts defense that was coordinated by Bears coach Matt Eberflus.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears re-sign DB Houston-CarsonMar 20, 2022Safety DeAndre Houston-Carson will return to the Bears for a seventh season after signing a one-year contract Sunday. The 28-year-old has appeared in 77 career games since arriving in 2016 as a sixth-round draft pick.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign WR Byron PringleMar 20, 2022The Bears on Sunday bolstered their offense by signing unrestricted free agent receiver Byron Pringle to a one-year contract. Pringle, 28, spent his first four NFL seasons with the Chiefs, catching 67 passes for 898 yards and seven touchdowns.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign DL Justin JonesMar 18, 2022The Bears on Friday bolstered their defense by signing tackle Justin Jones to a two-year contract. Jones arrives after spending his first four NFL seasons with the Chargers.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign WR Equanimeous St. BrownMar 18, 2022The Bears on Friday signed unrestricted free agent receiver Equanimeous St. Brown to a one-year contract. Brown spent his first four NFL seasons with the Packers, catching 37 passes for 543 yards and one touchdown.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears agree to terms with OL PatrickMar 16, 2022The Bears have agreed to terms with unrestricted free agent interior offensive lineman Lucas Patrick on a two-year contract. Patrick spent his first six NFL seasons with the Packers, appearing in 73 games with 34 starts.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears land free agent LB MorrowMar 16, 2022The Bears agreed to terms with unrestricted free agent linebacker Nicholas Morrow on a one-year contract. Morrow spent his first five NFL seasons with the Raiders, entering the league as an undrafted free agent.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears trade Khalil Mack to ChargersMar 16, 2022With the start of the new league year Wednesday, the trade sending Bears outside linebacker Khalil Mack to the Chargers in exchange for a 2022 second-round pick and 2023 sixth-round choice became official.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Moves: Bears release Cohen, TrevathanMar 16, 2022The Bears on Wednesday released running back Tarik Cohen and linebacker Danny Trevathan. Cohen has been sidelined with a knee injury since Week 3 of the 2020 season, while injuries limited Trevathan to five games last year.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign LS Patrick Scales to extensionMar 16, 2022Long-snapper Patrick Scales will return to the Bears for a seventh season after agreeing on Wednesday to a one-year contract extension.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears release NT Eddie GoldmanMar 14, 2022The Bears on Monday released veteran nose tackle Eddie Goldman. The 2015 second-round pick appeared in 81 games with 73 starts over six seasons, registering 175 tackles, 13.0 sacks and 18 tackles-for-loss.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears claim RB Evans off waiversMar 11, 2022The Bears on Friday claimed running back/kick returner Darrynton Evans off waivers from the Titans. Selected by Tennessee in the third round of the 2020 draft, he appeared in six games the past two seasons, all as a reserve.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Moves: Bears tender exclusive rights free agentsMar 08, 2022The Bears on Tuesday tendered one-year contracts to all three of their exclusive rights free agents: center Sam Mustipher, tight end Jesper Horsted and tackle Lachavious Simmons.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign linebacker Joe ThomasMar 01, 2022The Bears on Tuesday signed veteran inside linebacker Joe Thomas, who has appeared in 89 NFL games with 16 starts over seven seasons with the Packers (2015-17), Cowboys (2018-20), Texans (2021) and Ravens (2021).
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Move: Bears sign LB Noah DawkinsFeb 22, 2022The Bears on Tuesday signed linebacker Noah Dawkins. Dawkins, 24, has appeared in 17 NFL games over three seasons with the Buccaneers (2019) and Jets (2020-21).
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Roster Moves: Bears sign LS Brinkley, P WinslowFeb 16, 2022The Bears on Wednesday signed veteran long-snapper Beau Brinkley and punter Ryan Winslow.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Bears sign Wright to reserve/future contractFeb 12, 2022The Bears on Saturday signed offensive lineman Willie Wright to a reserve/future contract. Wright entered the NFL in 2019 with the Browns as an undrafted free agent from Tulsa.
